Origin: Inspired by their father's letter, a young dreamer seeks the end of the sky. But on preparing to depart, a warship appears in the village along with a mysterious girl seeking aid.
Russian: Вдохновленный письмом отца, молодой мечтатель ищет конец неба. Но, готовясь к отъезду, в деревне появляется военный корабль вместе с таинственной девушкой, ищущей помощи.

Origin: In a world abandoned by the gods, a lone dragon remained.
Russian: В мире, покинутом богами, остался одинокий дракон.

Origin: Bahamut, ruler of creation through destruction, sought to refine the realm the gods left behind into a richer, more bountiful place.
Russian: Бахамут, правитель творения через разрушение, стремился превратить оставленное богами царство в более богатое и изобильное.

Origin: But the arrival of invaders from beyond the sky—the Astrals—brought an end to his plans.
Russian: Но появление пришельцев из-за неба - Астралов, положило конец его планам.

Origin: The Astrals used creatures of terrible power known as primal beasts to bring the sky under their control. Long did the skies belong to the stars.
Russian: Астралы использовали существ ужасной силы, известных как первобытные звери, чтобы взять небо под свой контроль. Долгое время небо принадлежало звездам.

Origin: But the skydwellers bided their time and learned from their foes. Eventually they fought to take back the skies in a conflict that would come to be known as the War.
Russian: Но воздухоплаватели выжидали и учились у своих врагов. В конце концов, они сражались, чтобы вернуть небеса в конфликте, который стал известен как Война.

Origin: And here we find the Sky Realm, now a world of fragmented lands floating in a sea of clouds.
Russian: И здесь мы находим Небесное царство, теперь мир фрагментированных земель, плывущих в море облаков.

Origin: A new tale is about to begin here, spanning the skies and the stars alike...
Russian: Скоро здесь начнется новая сказка, охватывающая небо и звезды...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Say, are you serious about leavin' the village?
Russian: Скажи, ты серьезно собираешься покинуть деревню?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Sure, your dad wrote about the end of the sky in his letter, but getting there might as well be impossible...
Russian: Конечно, твой отец писал о конце неба в своем письме, но попасть туда с таким же успехом было бы невозможно...

Origin: I know we can reach it!
Russian: Я знаю, что мы сможем до него добраться!

Origin: I have a plan.
Russian: У меня есть план.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Oh! You mean with the Sky Map? The thingy the Astrals put together centuries ago?
Russian: Ох! Ты имеешь в виду Карту неба? Штуку, которую Астралы собрали много веков назад?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: If we had something like that, we could go anywhere! But you know that map's just something out of a fairy tale...
Russian: Если бы у нас было что-то подобное, мы могли бы пойти куда угодно! Но ты же знаешь, что эта карта - просто что-то из сказки...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Real or not, there's no stopping you once you've made up your mind. Beats hanging around this sleepy village anyway!
Russian: Правда или нет, но тебя не остановить, как только ты решишь. В любом случае, это лучше, чем ошиваться в этой сонной деревне!

Name: Vyrn
Origin:
Huh?
Whoa! Hang on a minute! What was that?
Russian:
А?
Вуа! Подожди минутку! Что это было?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: That's... a battleship! What's it doing here in the middle of nowhere?
Russian: Это... линкор! Что он делает здесь, в глуши?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: No way! What's going on here? I just heard something explode!
Russian: Не может быть! Что здесь происходит? Я только что услышал, как что-то взорвалось!

Origin: I just saw a flash over by the forest...
Russian: Я только что видел вспышку у леса...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: What do you think it was? A part of the ship?
Russian: Как ты думаешь, что это было? Часть корабля?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Hoo boy... What if that sets the whole forest on fire?
Russian: Хоо парень... Что если это подожжет весь лес?

Origin: We'd better check it out!
Russian: Нам лучше это проверить!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Whatever fell from that battleship should be over... here.
Russian: Что бы ни упало с того линкора, оно должно быть уже... здесь.

Origin: Eek!
Russian: Ик!

Name: Mysterious Girl
Origin: Ouch...
Russian: Ауч...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Who's the girl? Never seen her around here before.
Russian: Кто эта девушка? Никогда не видел ее здесь раньше.

Origin: Are you okay? You're not hurt are you?
Russian: Ты в порядке? Ты не ранен?

Name: Mysterious Girl
Origin: P-please! S-save me!
Russian: П-пожалуйста! С-спаси меня!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: H-hey... That's a big request to spring on someone!
Russian: Э-эй ... Это большая просьба напасть на кого-нибудь!

Name: Gruff Voice
Origin:
You there! Halt!
Drop your sword! Hands in the air!
Russian:
Ты там! Стой!
Брось меч! Руки вверх!

Name: Mysterious Girl
Origin: Gasp!
Russian: *Задыхается*

Origin: Soldiers in pursuit of the girl show up. Their armor suggests they are with the villainous Erste Empire, which employs military might to force kingdoms throughout the skies to their knees.
Russian: Солдаты, преследующие девушку, появляются. Их доспехи говорят о том, что они с злодейской империи Эрсте, которая использует военную мощь, чтобы заставить королевства по всему небу стоять на коленях.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Who are you guys? Are you trying to pick a fight?
Russian: Вы кто такие? Вы пытаетесь завязать драку?

Name: Imperial Soldier
Origin: If your life means anything to you, you'll cooperate and hand over that girl.
Russian: Если твоя жизнь для тебя что-то значит, ты будешь сотрудничать и отдашь эту девушку.

Origin: The soldiers' hostile intentions terrifies the girl.
Russian: Враждебные намерения солдат пугают девушку.

Name: Mysterious Girl
Origin: N-no!
Russian: Н-нет!

Name: Imperial Soldier
Origin: You heard me! Hand her over! You don't want to force my hand.
Russian: Ты меня слышал! Отдай ее! Не вынуждая меня применять силу.

Origin: She asked for our help!
Russian: Она попросила нашей помощи!

Origin: Like we can trust you!
Russian: Как будто мы можем вам доверять!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: That's right! We can't just do what you say when she's shakin' like a leaf over here!
Russian: Верно! Мы не можем просто делать то, что ты говоришь, когда она дрожит, как лист!

Name: Imperial Soldier
Origin: So that's how we're gonna play it, huh? Don't say I didn't warn you!
Russian: Так вот как мы будем играть, хах? Не говори, что я тебя не предупреждал!

Origin: Two elite soldiers are pursuing the mysterious girl named Lyria. The knight Katalina tries to protect her, while Captain Pommern attempts to do harm to the girl and young dreamer alike.
Russian: Два элитных солдата преследуют таинственную девушку по имени Лирия. Рыцарь Каталина пытается защитить ее, в то время как капитан Поммерн пытается причинить вред как девушке, так и молодому мечтателю.

Name: Imperial Soldier
Origin: Argh! Why you little...
Russian: Аргх! Почему ты маленький...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Betcha weren't expecting that, huh? You can only dream of matching my pal's sword skills!
Russian: Бьюсь об заклад, мы этого не ожидали, да? Ты можешь только мечтать о том, чтобы соответствовать мастерству меча моего приятеля!

Name: Imperial Soldier
Origin: Curses... This isn't over!
Russian: Проклятие... Это еще не конец!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: A friend of his? Stay sharp!
Russian: Его друг? Будь начеку!

Name: Knight
Origin: Lyria! Are you all right?
Russian: Лирия! Ты в порядке?

Name: Mysterious Girl
Origin: Katalina! I... I...
Russian: Каталина! Я... Я...

Name: Knight
Origin: Thank goodness she hasn't been injured. Have you two been protecting her?
Russian: Слава богу, она не пострадала. Вы двое защищали ее?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: I guess you could say that! They were after us too, so we just did what came naturally.
Russian: Думаю, можно и так сказать! Они тоже преследовали, так что мы просто делали то, что было естественным.

Name: Mysterious Girl
Origin: You should have seen it, Katalina! This hero saved me! It was so... heroic!
Russian: Ты бы видела, Каталина! Этот герой спас меня! Это было так... героически!

Name: Knight
Origin: Is that so? Well, I'm just glad you're safe.
Russian: Неужели? Ну, я рада, что ты в безопасности.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: So, um... Who are you guys exactly?
Russian: Итак, эм ... Кто вы такие, ребята?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Doesn't seem like you're friends with those jerks from earlier.
Russian: Не похоже, что вы дружите с теми придурками, что были здесь раньше.

Name: Katalina
Origin: Ah, yes, how rude of me. My name is Katalina Aryze.
Russian: Ах, да, как грубо с моей стороны. Меня зовут Каталина Аризе.

Name: Katalina
Origin: And this is Lyria. I can't thank you enough for saving her.
Russian: А это Лирия. Я не могу отблагодарить вас за то, что вы спасли ее.

Name: Katalina
Origin: If you don't mind, could you tell me your name as well?
Russian: Если вы не возражаете, не могли бы вы сказать, как вас зовут?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: And I'm Vyrn! Where'd you two come from? Were those soldiers after you?
Russian: Я - Вирн! Откуда вы двое взялись? Эти солдаты преследовали вас?

Name: Lyria
Origin: W-where? Well, uh...
Russian: Откуда? Ну... эээ...

Name: Katalina
Origin:
That's right...
We... were being chased.
Russian:
Верно...
Нас... преследовали.

Name: Katalina
Origin: Which is why we need to get out of here before more of them show up, and—
Russian: Вот почему нам нужно убраться отсюда, пока не появилось еще больше людей, и...

Origin: Lieutenant Katalina!
Russian: Лейтенант Каталина!

Origin: I do say. Did I give the order for you to stop and smell the roses out here, Lieutenant?
Russian: Я говорю. Разве я приказал вам остановиться и понюхать здешние розы, лейтенант?

Name: Katalina
Origin: C-Captain Pommern! Terribly sorry, sir. I'll return Lyria to the ship immediatel—
Russian: К-Капитан Поммерн! Ужасно сожалею, сэр. Я немедленно верну Лирию на корабль...

Name: Pommern
Origin: Enough of these lies! You're the one who spirited her away from the ship, are you not?
Russian: Хватит этой лжи! Ты ведь та, кто помог ей уйти с корабля, не так ли?

Name: Pommern
Origin: I do say! To defy the mighty Erste Empire requires profound bravery... and profound stupidity.
Russian: Я говорю! Чтобы бросить вызов могущественной империи Эрсте, нужна огромная храбрость... и огромная глупость.

Name: Pommern
Origin: You knew the classified nature of the girl's existence when we placed her in your protection.
Russian: Вы знали о секретной природе существования девушки, когда мы поместили ее под вашу защиту.

Name: Pommern
Origin: Which means you must surely be aware of the gravity of your actions, yes?
Russian: Что означает, что вы, безусловно, должны быть осведомлены о тяжести ваших действий, да?

Name: Pommern
Origin: We need that girl to command the primals. To assist in her escape demands a grave punishment indeed!
Russian: Нам нужна эта девушка, чтобы командовать первобытными. Чтобы помочь ей сбежать, необходимо суровое наказание!

Name: Katalina
Origin: Captain... I simply thought it too dangerous for us to attempt using the power of the primal beasts.
Russian: Капитан... Я просто подумала, что для нас слишком опасно пытаться использовать силу первобытных зверей.

Name: Katalina
Origin: The primals are a legacy of the Astrals... Terrifying weapons that set the skies ablaze during the War.
Russian: Первобытные - это наследие астральных... Ужасное оружие, которое сжигало небо во время войны.

Name: Katalina
Origin: There's still much we don't know about them. To wield their power is—
Russian: Мы еще многого не знаем о них. Обладать их силой это...

Name: Pommern
Origin: Don't change the subject!
Russian: Не меняйте тему!

Name: Pommern
Origin: I do say... I've had quite enough of your insipid drivel. It's time to do what we came here for.
Russian: Я говорю... Хватит с меня твоей глупой болтовни. Пришло время сделать то, зачем мы сюда пришли.

Name: Pommern
Origin: Bweheheh... Who will weep for this pathetic backwater burg? No one! We shall destroy it!
Russian: Бвехехе... Кто будет оплакивать это жалкое захолустье? Никто! Мы уничтожим его!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Excuse me?
Russian: Простите?

Name: Pommern
Origin: I'll rid this place of anyone who opposes us! For I do say, the power to control the primals belongs to the Empire!
Russian: Я избавлю это место от всех, кто против нас! Ибо я говорю, что власть контролировать первобытных принадлежит Империи!

Name: Pommern
Origin: Release the Hydra!
Russian: Освободите Гидру!

Name: Imperial Soldier
Origin: Sir!
Russian: Сэр!

Name: Katalina
Origin: The Hydra? It can't be!
Russian: Гидра? Не может быть!

Name: Pommern
Origin: It can, Lieutenant! And all so that you may take proper responsibility for your actions!
Russian: Может, лейтенант! И все для того, чтобы вы могли принять на себя надлежащую ответственность за свои действия!

Name: Imperial Soldier
Origin: Use the Hydra! Spread out in formation to keep them from running!
Russian: Используйте Гидру! Рассредоточьтесь, не дайте им сбежать!

Name: Hydra
Origin: Groooar!
Russian: Грооар!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Where'd this crazy monster come from! Did that beard-twirlin' doofus bring it with him?
Russian: Откуда взялось это безумное чудовище! Этот бородатый дурачок принёс его с собой?

Name: Lyria
Origin: Katalina!
Russian: Каталина!

Name: Katalina
Origin: You really intend to burn this island to the ground, don't you?

Name: Katalina
Origin: Is that how far the Empire's willing to go to use Lyria's power as their own?

Name: Pommern
Origin: I believe we've explained this before, Lieutenant. With her power as a foundation, the Empire will rule the skies.

Name: Pommern
Origin: We came to this island to research its primal shrine...

Name: Pommern
Origin: But what we found instead was betrayal most foul!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Katalina, I'm sorry... This is all because I asked you to take me outside...

Name: Katalina
Origin: Lyria, I promised to show you the outside world. And no matter what happens, I'll stand by that promise.

Name: Hydra
Origin: Grrr!
Russian: Грр-р!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Hold on... You're not actually thinking about tangling with that thing!
We have to save them!
It's now or never!

Name: Pommern
Origin: I do say! It seems none of you are willing to accept reality!

Name: Pommern
Origin: Hydra! Dispose of this miserable little moppet!

Name: Pommern
Origin: May the tot serve as a fitting example of what happens when you defy the Empire!

Name: Hydra
Origin: Groooar!
Russian: Грооар!

Name: Vyrn
Origin:
Whoa! !
H-hang in there, buddy!

Name: Pommern
Origin: Bweheheh! How utterly pitiful!

Name: Katalina
Origin: An innocent civilian, and a child at that... Pommern! Just how far have you fallen!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Hey, ! Stop kidding around! Say something! Anything!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Everything's... all right...

Name: Pommern
Origin: I do say! What is this light?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Look... The shrine's primal crystal is reacting... What is she doing?

Name: Pommern
Origin: Oh ho... We heard the shrine here was special...

Name: Pommern
Origin: B-but what in the skies is this?

Name: Lyria
Origin: Don't worry now...

Name: Lyria
Origin: ... I bestow my power on you!
Russian: ... Я дарю тебе свою силу!

Origin: Lyria reveals how she pried [Игрок] from the jaws of death by synchronizing their life forces after the young hero suffered a near-fatal wound at the claws of Captain Pommern's Hydra. [Игрок] and Lyria's souls are now permanently intertwined.
Russian: Лирия рассказывает о том, как она вырвала [Игрок] из пасти смерти, синхронизировав их жизненные силы после того, как молодой герой получил почти смертельную рану от когтей Гидры капитана Поммерна. Душа [Игрок] и душа Лирии теперь навсегда переплелись.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Primeval dragon...
Russian: Первобытный дракон...

Name: Lyria
Origin: Child of flames and darkness...
Russian: Дитя пламени и тьмы...

Name: Lyria
Origin: Thy name is...
Russian: Имя твое...

Name: Lyria
Origin: Bahamut!
Russian: Бахамут!

Name: Bahamut
Origin: Roooar!
Russian: Роо-оар!

Name: Hydra
Origin: Gwaarrgh...
Russian: Гваарргх...

Name: Pommern
Origin: What? It can't be! How could my beloved Hydra be annihilated with a single attack!

Name: Pommern
Origin: No! No, no, no! It can't be! I refuse to believe it!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Hey! Now's our chance! Let's get outta here, [Игрок]!

Name: Katalina
Origin: This way, [Игрок]! We have to get those wounds treated immediately!
Thanks to Lyria's mysterious powers, [Игрок] was able to summon a primal beast and defeat the Hydra.
The group takes advantage of the confusion to slip away. With Katalina acting as a guide, they escape the forest.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Huff... Huff... I think we managed to lose the beard-twirlin' doofus...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: That primal beast... You said its name is Bahamut? You managed to awaken a primal?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: I thought the Astrals were the only ones who could control them.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Besides, weren't the primals all wiped out hundreds of years ago during the War?

Name: Katalina
Origin: Lyria's power makes it possible. She's the only one who can control them... besides the Astrals.

Name: Katalina
Origin: And it would appear that's not all she can do...
The deep flesh wounds from the Hydra's claws have vanished from [Игрок].

Name: Katalina
Origin: Are you okay? Any pain or discomfort?
I seem to be fine.
Nothing feels strange.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Katalina... [Игрок] risked life and limb to save me...

Name: Lyria
Origin: But as a result, [Игрок] suffered horribly. Seeing [Игрок]'s vital flame begin to flicker and weaken, I decided to link our beings...

Name: Lyria
Origin: To repay [Игрок] in kind!

Name: Katalina
Origin: What!

Name: Lyria
Origin: That's right. From now on our souls are permanently intertwined...

Name: Lyria
Origin: [Игрок] and I now share the same life force.

Name: Lyria
Origin: I hope you're not mad... It was my only choice.
Thanks for saving me!

Name: Lyria
Origin: By the way, I didn't summon that primal just by myself.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Bahamut seems to have appeared to protect you, [Игрок]... To lend you strength.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: No way... That's incredible! I always knew [Игрок] was something special!

Name: Imperial Soldier
Origin: Hey, I've found them! They're over here!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Rats... Didn't take long for his cronies to show up. Are you good to go, [Игрок]?

Name: Katalina
Origin: You escaped the grim reaper once today. Don't overwork yourself. I'll back you up this time.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Are you sure? I mean, aren't you working for them?

Name: Katalina
Origin: You heard the story, didn't you? I betrayed the Empire and helped Lyria escape.

Name: Katalina
Origin:
I'll save the rest for later.
Now get ready! They're here!

Concluding that they'll be captured if they linger any longer, [Игрок] and the new-found crew jump on a small airship and leave behind the island of Zinkenstill. Together with the enigmatic Lyria, [Игрок] begins a journey to the end of the sky.

Name: Katalina
Origin: Ngh... If we stay here, it's only a matter of time before they back us into a corner.

Name: Katalina
Origin: We've no choice but to leave the island! Come! I prepared a small ship ahead of time for our escape!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Looks like your dream of skyfaring's coming true faster than we thought, [Игрок]! Better brace yourself!
I'm ready for anything!
Shouldn't you brace yourself Vyrn?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Ha ha! You sure know how to roll with the punches. Just like your dad!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Ha ha! Who do you think you're talkin' to?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: If anyone here was born to fly, it's me!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Hey, Katalina. Vyrn and [Игрок] seem like best friends, don't you think?

Name: Katalina
Origin: They do indeed.

Name: Katalina
Origin: It's strange, but... I can't help but feel a sense of calm when I see Vyrn flying there so innocently.

Name: Lyria
Origin: You've always liked cute little animals, right, Katalina?

Name: Katalina
Origin: Yes... But this is no time to daydream!

Name: Katalina
Origin: Let's go. The ship's this way!
Got it!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Our time to shine's arrived at last, [Игрок]!

Name: Lyria
Origin: I guess it's a new beginning for us both then, [Игрок]!
The gang boards a small imperial airship and sets sail from [Игрок]'s secluded island home.
Hurtling towards a seemingly boundless sea of golden clouds, they're overcome not with fear, but with a sense of hope.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: The sky! We're flying through the sky!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Hey, Katalina! Where are we headed in this thing?

Name: Katalina
Origin: Good question... You're headed for the end of the sky, right, [Игрок]?

Name: Katalina
Origin: That must mean Estalucia, the legendary island where the Astrals are said to live. Making it there won't be easy.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Oh really! Tell us somethin' we don't know! Right, [Игрок]?

Name: Katalina
Origin: I see... Then our first order of business is to cross the Grim Basin, which divides the skydoms.

Name: Katalina
Origin: That fits my plan. We can't stay here in Phantagrande Skydom after all. Not while it's under the influence of the Empire.

Name: Lyria
Origin: But the sky's so vast... Are they really going to come after us?

Name: Katalina
Origin: I'm certain they will... But you needn't worry. The sky is boundless!

Name: Katalina
Origin: Once we're outside Phantagrande, the Empire shouldn't be able to chase us.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Sounds like we're in for the long haul!

Name: Katalina
Origin: Indeed. To the end of the sky... We may be playing things by ear, but I can't help but feel a little excited.

Name: Katalina
Origin: First things first. We need to get our supplies in order.

Name: Katalina
Origin: If we head to a large town, there should be a general store that caters to airship crews.

Name: Katalina
Origin: Our closest options are Port Breeze and the Valtz Duchy... There's bound to be someone there who can provide what we need.

Name: Lyria
Origin: I can't believe it... I'm on a journey to a new world!

Name: Lyria
Origin: With Katalina, Vyrn, [Игрок], and maybe even more people we'll meet along the way.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: We'll probably make plenty of new friends! I can't wait to see who we run into!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: So let's get this adventure to the end of the sky started, [Игрок]!
[Игрок]'s soul now one with Lyria's, the time has come to bid farewell to home.
As though sent by [Игрок]'s father from the other side of the infinite sky, a gentle blue breeze blows across the young voyager's hair.
